name: IpException
brief:
Exception base class and macros for Ipopt error handling

Provides IpoptException base class and convenience macros:
- DECLARE_STD_EXCEPTION(Type): Define new exception class
- THROW_EXCEPTION(Type, msg): Throw with file/line info
- ASSERT_EXCEPTION(cond, Type, msg): Conditional throw

Exceptions carry source location (file, line) and message for
debugging. Can be reported via Journalist::ReportException().

Uses special visibility attributes on macOS to ensure exceptions
can be caught across shared library boundaries.
